posts.title: 我的第一个Blog
posts.text: 测试使用的第一个Blog，测试下Hexo+Git的模式捣鼓得如何（其实已经捣鼓了一天了）

posts.title: PokeMMO精灵计算器实现
posts.text: 能力值计算公式（[ ]表示取整）HP[种族值2+个体值+[努力值/4]]*等级/100+等级+10物攻、物防、特攻、特防、速度[[种族值2+个体值+[努力值/4]]*等级/100+5]*性格修正 伤害计算公式的excel表格呈现 A方最小伤害量123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233//计算基础伤害2+(2*D$1+10)/250*D14*CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$4,H$6)/CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$27,H$29)//取整ROUNDDOWN(2+(2*D$1+10)/250*D14*CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$4,H$6)/CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$27,H$29),0)//取最小随机数后取整ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(2+(2*D$1+10)/250*D14*CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$4,H$6)/CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$27,H$29),0)*0.85,0)//计算天气影响*SWITCH($D$20,"无天气",1,"大晴天",SWITCH(E14,"火",1.5,"水",0.5,1),"雨天",SWITCH(E14,"火",0.5,"水",1.5,1),1)//取整ROUNDDOWN(！！,0)//计算属性一致加成*IF(OR(E14=$B$10,E14=$C$10),1.5,1)//取整ROUNDDOWN(！！！,0)//属性克制加成*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE))//取整ROUNDDOWN(！！！！！,0)//达人带或者命玉加成*SWITCH($B$12,"达人带",IF(INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE))>1,1.2,1) ,"生命宝珠",1.3,1 )//写成一行*SWITCH($B$12,"达人带",IF(INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE))>1,1.2,1),"生命宝珠",1.3,1)//取整ROUNDDOWN(！！！！！！,0)//最终结果！！=ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(2+(2*D$1+10)/250*D14*CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$4,H$6)/CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$27,H$29),0)*0.85,0)*SWITCH($D$20,"无天气",1,"大晴天",SWITCH(E14,"火",1.5,"水",0.5,1),"雨天",SWITCH(E14,"火",0.5,"水",1.5,1),1),0)*IF(OR(E14=$B$10,E14=$C$10),1.5,1),0)*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE)),0)*SWITCH($B$12,"达人带",IF(INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE))>1,1.2,1),"生命宝珠",1.3,1),0)//取整 A方最大伤害量12345=ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(2+(2*D$1+10)/250*D14*CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$4,H$6)/CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B14,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$27,H$29),0)*0.85,0)*SWITCH($D$20,"无天气",1,"大晴天",SWITCH(E14,"火",1.5,"水",0.5,1),"雨天",SWITCH(E14,"火",0.5,"水",1.5,1),1),0)*IF(OR(E14=$B$10,E14=$C$10),1.5,1),0)*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE)),0)*SWITCH($B$12,"达人带",IF(INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E14,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$32,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE))>1,1.2,1),"生命宝珠",1.3,1),0) B方最小伤害量12=ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(ROUNDDOWN(2+(2*D$1+10)/250*D36*CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B36,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$26,H$28)/CHOOSE(VLOOKUP(B36,技能列表!$A:$H,4,FALSE),H$5,H$7),0)*0.85,0)*SWITCH($D$20,"无天气",1,"大晴天",SWITCH(E36,"火",1.5,"水",0.5,1),"雨天",SWITCH(E36,"火",0.5,"水",1.5,1),1),0)*IF(OR(E36=$B$32,E36=$C$32),1.5,1),0)*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E36,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$10,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E36,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$10,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE)),0)*SWITCH($B34,"达人带",IF(INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E36,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($B$10,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE))*INDEX(MMO属性相克表!$C$2:$T$18,VLOOKUP($E36,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$18,2,FALSE),VLOOKUP($C$10,MMO属性相克表!$A$2:$B$19,2,FALSE))>1,1.2,1),"生命宝珠",1.3,1),0)

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
